--- prince: true order: 33 title: Inquisition – Ordo Xenos name: Ordo Xenos Inquisition introduction: | forces: - ordo-xenos - imperial-navy - titan-legion using_the_army_list: | The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Ordo Xenos of the Inquisition. Ordo Xenos armies may be supported by Imperial Navy aircraft, Titan Legion battlegroup or Ordo Xenos aircraft formations. A maximum of up to a third of the points available to the army may be spent on these formations. special_rules_text: | The _They Shall Know No Fear_ rule applies to all Deathwatch detachment formations (see [_They Shall Know No Fear_](#they-shall-know-no-fear)). special_rules: ---

Ordo Xenos armies have a strategy rating of 5. Imperial Navy aircraft formations have an initiative rating of 2+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 1+.

Deathwatch Detachments
Formation Units Upgrades Cost
Assault Four Deathwatch Assault units Commander 250 points
Bike Five Deatchwatch Bike units Commander 275 points
Land Speeder Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado Commander, Typhoons 200 points
Landing Craft One Landing Craft None 350 points
Scout Four Deathwatch Scout units plus transport Commander, Razorbacks 250 points
0–1 Strike Cruiser One Strike Cruiser Battle Barge 200 points
Terminator Four Deathwatch Terminator units Commander, Dreadnoughts, Land Raiders 350 points
Veterans Four Deathwatch Veteran units plus transport Commander, Dreadnoughts, Razorback, Land Raiders 200 points
Deathwatch Upgrades
(Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment.)
Upgrade Units Cost
Battle Barge Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge +150 points
Commander Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation: Captain +25 points
Chaplain, Librarian +50 points
0–1 Supreme Commander per army +100 points
Dreadnoughts Add up to two Dreadnoughts +50 points each
Land Raiders Add up to four Land Raiders +75 points each
+125 points per pair
Razorbacks Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation +25 points each
Typhoons Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons +10 points each
Imperial Guard Platoons
Formation Units Upgrades Cost
Infantry One Commander unit and eight Infantry units Chimera, Commissar, Hydra 200 points
Rough Rider Six Rough Riders Commissar 150 points
Sentinel Four Sentinels Commissar 100 points
Storm Trooper Eight Storm Troopers Commissar, Transport 200 points
Tank Six Leman Russ Commissar, Hydra 400 points
Imperial Guard Upgrades
(Each upgrade may be taken once per platoon.)
Upgrade Units Cost
Chimera Add five Chimera +100 points
Commissar Add one Commissar character to any unit in the formation +25 points
Hydra Add one Hydra +50 points
Transport Add four unts from one of the following options: Rhinos Free
Chimeras +100 points
Valkyries +150 points
Imperial Ally and Ordos Xenos Aircraft Formations
(Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.)
Imperial Navy Aircraft
Formation Units Cost
Marauder Squadron Two Marauder Bombers 250 points
Thunderbolt Squadron Two Thunderbolt Fighters 175 points
Titan Legion Battlegroups
Formation Units Cost
Reaver One Reaver Class Titan 650 points
Warhound One Warhound Class Titan 275 points
Warhound Pack Two Warhound Class Titans 500 points
Warlord One Warlord Class Titan 825 points
Ordo Xenos Aircraft
Formation Units Cost
Thunderhawk Gunship One Thunderhawk Gunship 200 points
